name: Last Night in Zombie Village
description:
Last Night in Zombie Village is a dynamic first-person zombie shooter.



Sometimes it's better not to wait until the sun goes down. Having decided to spend the night in an abandoned village, you could not even imagine that the rumors about the living dead would turn out to be true. You will not see the dawn, but will you be able to sell your life more dearly? Zombies are always trying to get to your brains, and the only way to get ahead of them is to make sure that your bullets get to their brains faster. Several types of weapons will help you in this difficult task, from a pistol to a machine gun, and the money earned by shooting the undead can be spent on improving them. Challenge yourself along the way!




Features:

  • Adrenaline gameplay: run if you want to survive! Shoot if you want to survive longer!
  • Lots of cool achievements for real zombie hunters!
  • Online leaderboard where you can compete against the best shooters!

Kill zombies, buy weapon upgrades and try to survive as long as possible!
